definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

sentences.english: Ninety-five percent of cheetah cubs die before reaching independence.
sentences.chinese: 95%的獵豹幼崽在能夠獨立生存之前死亡。

sentences.english: How do you say good- bye to someone you can't imagine living without?
sentences.chinese: 你要如何和你認爲離開了就無法生存的人說再見？

sentences.english: The main concern is, whether those cartoonists are able to carry on their carrers as artists, just as they have been before?
sentences.chinese: 漫畫家能否再像以前一樣，作爲藝術家而生存？

sentences.english: I learned to live when I thought it better to die …
sentences.chinese: 萬念懼灰的時候，我學會了生存。

sentences.english: During summer, Kiwi birds have a tough time surviving the rodent population boom.
sentences.chinese: 夏季，齧齒動物數量大增，鷸鴕生存艱難。

sentences.english: To survive as individuals, we'll have to learn to temper our trust.
sentences.chinese: 作爲個體想要生存，我們就必須學會調和我們的信任。

sentences.english: According to some, seeking prominence is part of an inborn survival strategy.
sentences.chinese: 據一些科學家說，尋找顯著性是與生俱來的生存技巧。

sentences.english: This kind of single-lung fish can live up to 12 hours when out of water.
sentences.chinese: 這種單肺魚離開水面能生存多達12小時。

sentences.english: These are the keys to keeping up in the fast-paced arena of social networks.
sentences.chinese: 這是在日新月異的社交網絡環境中生存的要義。

sentences.english: Some of them are protective colouring that is designed to make it easier to survive in a crowded, judgemental and often intolerant world.
sentences.chinese: 有些是爲了更好地在嘈雜殘酷的世界中生存的保護色。

sentences.english: Notoc flgellifrme is of the strong selection to the survival environment.
sentences.chinese: 髮菜對生存環境的選擇性很強。

sentences.english: Practice-creation is the essence of Marx's freedom-living idea.
sentences.chinese: 實踐創生性是馬克思自由生存觀的本質。

sentences.english: If there were no air and water, no living thing could live.
sentences.chinese: 假如沒有空氣跟水，沒有生物能夠生存。
兩種媒介各有各的生存空間。

sentences.english: Every human spent about half an hour as a single cell.
sentences.chinese: 每個人作爲單細胞生存的時間約爲半小時。

sentences.english: How many years can a mountain exist Before it is washed to the sea?
sentences.chinese: 一座山要生存多少年才能被衝進海洋？

definition: to seek survival/to possess the will to live
to multiply/to reproduce/to increase gradually in number or quantity
lit. the weak are prey to the strong (idiom); fig. predatory behavior/the law of the jungle
settle down and get on with one's pursuit
to struggle on whilst at death's door (idiom)
